account_history_rocksdb_blacklist_ops.description: Defines a list of operations which will be explicitly ignored.

account_history_rocksdb_path.description: The location of the rocksdb database for account history. By default it is $DATA_DIR/blockchain/account-history-rocksdb-storage

account_history_rocksdb_track_account_ra.description: Defines a range of accounts to track as a json pair ["from","to"] [from,to] Can be specified multiple times.

account_history_rocksdb_whitelist_ops.description: Defines a list of operations which will be explicitly logged.

alternate_chain_spec.description: Filepath for the alternate chain specification in JSON format

backtrace.description: Whether to print backtrace on SIGSEGV

block_data_export_file.description: Where to export data (NONE to discard)

block_data_skip_empty.description: Skip producing when no factory is registered

block_log_compression_level.description: Block log zstd compression level 0 (fast, low compression) - 22 (slow, high compression)

block_log_info_print_file.description: Where to print (filename or special sink ILOG, STDOUT, STDERR)

block_log_info_print_interval_seconds.description: How often to print out block_log_info (default 1 day)

block_log_info_print_irreversible.description: Whether to defer printing until block is irreversible

block_log_split.description: Whether the block log should be single file (-1), not used at all & keeping only head block in memory (0), or split into files each containing 1M blocks & keeping N full million latest blocks (N). Default 9999.

block_stats_report_output.description: Where to put block stat reports: DLOG, ILOG, NOTIFY, LOG_NOTIFY. Default ILOG.

block_stats_report_type.description: Level of detail of block stat reports: NONE, MINIMAL, REGULAR, FULL. Default FULL (recommended for API nodes).

blockchain_thread_pool_size.description: Number of worker threads used to pre-validate transactions and blocks

cashout_logging_ending_block.description: Ending block for comment cashout log

cashout_logging_starting_block.description: Starting block for comment cashout log

checkpoint.description: Pairs of [BLOCK_NUM,BLOCK_ID] that should be enforced as checkpoints.

colony_article.description: Size and frequency parameters of article transactions.

colony_custom.description: Size and frequency parameters of custom_json transactions. If no other transaction type is requested, minimal custom jsons will be produced.

colony_max_concurrency.description: Number of transactions per thread that can be sent to queue with no wait. 0 means auto adjust. Default is 1000

colony_no_broadcast.description: Disables broadcasting of produced transactions - only local witness will include them in block.

colony_reply.description: Size and frequency parameters of reply transactions.

colony_sign_with.description: WIF PRIVATE KEY to be used to sign each transaction.

colony_start_at_block.description: Start producing transactions when block with given number becomes head block (or right at the start if the block already passed).

colony_threads.description: Number of worker threads. Default is 2

colony_transactions_per_block.description: Max number of transactions produced per block. When not set it will be sum of weights of individual types.

colony_transfer.description: Size and frequency parameters of transfer transactions.

colony_vote.description: Size and frequency parameters of vote transactions.

colony_wait_for_work.description: Time (in milliseconds) to wait before checking if there is more work to do. 0 will just yield() the thread. Default is 50

comment_archive.description: Type of comment archive to use: NONE means comments won't be archived, MEMORY keeps archived comments in memory, ROCKSDB stores them in RocksDB. Default: ROCKSDB

debug_node_edit_script.description: Database edits to apply on startup (may specify multiple times)

enable_block_log_auto_fixing.description: If enabled, corrupted block_log will try to fix itself automatically.

enable_block_log_compression.description: Compress blocks using zstd as they're added to the block log

enable_stale_production.description: Enable block production, even if the chain is stale.

flush_state_interval.description: flush shared memory changes to disk every N blocks

log_appender.description:
Appender definition JSON. Obligatory attributes:
"appender" - name of appender
"stream" - target stream, mutually exclusive with "file"
"file" - target filename (including path), mutually exclusive with "stream"
Optional attributes:
"time_format" - see time_format enum values (default: "iso_8601_seconds")
Optional attributes (applicable to file appender only):
"delta_times" - whether times should be printed as deltas since previous message (default: false)
"flush" - whether each log write should end with flush (default: true)
"truncate" - whether to truncate the log file at startup (default: true)
"rotate" - whether the log files should be rotated (default: true)
"rotation_interval" - seconds between file rotation (default: 3600)
"rotation_limit" - seconds before rotated file is removed (default: 86400)

log_logger.description:
Logger definition JSON:
"name" - name of logger
"level" - level of reporting, see log_level enum values
"appenders" - list of designated appenders

market_history_bucket_size.description: Track market history by grouping orders into buckets of equal size measured in seconds specified as a JSON array of numbers

market_history_buckets_per_size.description: How far back in time to track history for each bucket size, measured in the number of buckets (default: 5760)

max_mempool_size.description: Postponed transactions that exceed limit are dropped from pending. Setting 0 means only pending transactions that fit in reapplication window of 200ms will stay in mempool.

notifications_endpoint.description: list of addresses, that will receive notification about in-chain events

p2p_endpoint.description: The local IP address and port to listen for incoming connections.

p2p_max_connections.description: Maxmimum number of incoming connections on P2P endpoint.

p2p_seed_node.description: The IP address and port of a remote peer to sync with.

pacemaker_max_offset.description: maximum time of emission offset from block timestamp in milliseconds, default 20000ms (when exceeded, node will be stopped)

pacemaker_min_offset.description: minimum time of emission offset from block timestamp in milliseconds, default -300ms

pacemaker_source.description: path to block_log file - source of block emissions

plugin.description: Plugin(s) to enable, may be specified multiple times

private_key.description: WIF PRIVATE KEY to be used by one or more witnesses or miners

queen_block_size.description: Size of blocks expected to be filled (or max allowed by witnesses). Default value 0 means max blocks.

queen_tx_count.description: Number of transactions in block. Default value 0 means no limit.

rc_flood_level.description: Number of full blocks that can be present in mempool before RC surcharge is applied. 0-65535. Default 20 (one minute of full blocks).

rc_flood_surcharge.description: Multiplication factor for temporary extra RC cost charged for each block above flood level before transaction is allowed to enter and remain in pending. 0-10000. Default 10000 (100%).

rc_stats_report_output.description: Where to put daily RC stat reports: DLOG, ILOG, NOTIFY, LOG_NOTIFY. Default ILOG.

rc_stats_report_type.description: Level of detail of daily RC stat reports: NONE, MINIMAL, REGULAR, FULL. Default REGULAR.

required_participation.description: Percent of witnesses (0-99) that must be participating in order to produce blocks

shared_file_dir.description: the location of the chain shared memory files (absolute path or relative to application data dir)

shared_file_full_threshold.description: A 2 precision percentage (0-10000) that defines the threshold for when to autoscale the shared memory file. Setting this to 0 disables autoscaling. Recommended value for consensus node is 9500 (95%).

shared_file_scale_rate.description: A 2 precision percentage (0-10000) that defines how quickly to scale the shared memory file. When autoscaling occurs the file's size will be increased by this percent. Setting this to 0 disables autoscaling. Recommended value is between 1000-2000 (10-20%)

shared_file_size.description: Size of the shared memory file. Default: 24G. If running with many plugins, increase this value to 28G.

snapshot_root_dir.description: The location (root-dir) of the snapshot storage, to save/read portable state dumps

statsd_endpoint.description: Endpoint to send statsd messages to.

transaction_status_block_depth.description: Defines the number of blocks from the head block that transaction statuses will be tracked.

webserver_http_endpoint.description: Local http endpoint for webserver requests.

webserver_https_certificate_file_name.description: File name with a server's certificate.

webserver_https_endpoint.description: Local https endpoint for webserver requests.

webserver_https_key_file_name.description: File name with a server's private key.

webserver_thread_pool_size.description: Number of threads used to handle queries. Default: 32.

webserver_unix_endpoint.description: Local unix http endpoint for webserver requests.

webserver_ws_deflate.description: Enable the RFC-7692 permessage-deflate extension for the WebSocket server (only used if the client requests it).  This may save bandwidth at the expense of CPU

webserver_ws_endpoint.description: Local websocket endpoint for webserver requests.

witness.description: name of witness controlled by this node (e.g. initwitness )
